remarks: Commutative/associative law for vector addition and subtraction. (Contributed by NM, 24-Jan-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvsubadd.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvsubadd.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
nvsubadd.3 $e |- M = ( -v ` U ) $.
nvaddsub $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A G B ) M C ) = ( ( A M C ) G B ) ) $.
